titles.title: To designate the bridge over lock and dam numbered 4 on the Arkansas River as the "Lawrence Blackwell Memorial Bridge".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 6/23/1997--Introduced. Designates the bridge over lock and dam numbered 4 on the Arkansas River, Arkansas, as the Lawrence Blackwell Memorial Bridge.
